name: Probar Protein Cookie Dough Bar
description:
A bar that's packed with soy protein, yet tastes like fresh cookie dough. And it serves up your omega 3 and 6s from chia and flax seeds.Ingredients: soy protein isolate, organic tapioca syrup, organic dried cane syrup, organic agave syrup, modified palm kernel oil, glycerine, organic agave inulin, sugar, cocoa, omega blend (flaxseed, chia seed), natural flavour, unsweetened chocolate, organic rice protein concentrate, high oleic safflower oil, tapioca starch, organic soy protein isolate, ground almonds, salt, molasses, soy lecithin, cocoa butter, gum arabic, rosemary extract, tocopherols, citric acid, ascorbic acid.Contains: almonds, soybean.
